text: Tini'i se'ijana yini niraksaradera madhye, tadera'i madhye theke, ekajana rasula damra kariyechena, tini tadera kache patha karachena tamra nirdesabali, ara tini tadera pabitra karechena, ara tini tadera siksa diyechena dharmagrantha o jnanabijnana, yadi'o era age tara to chila spasta bibhrantite
